Hanzi: 棂

櫺字的基本解释

櫺
líng
见“棂”。

櫺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［líng］
［《廣韻》郎丁切，平青，來。］
亦作“欞1”。
(1)窗户或栏杆上雕有花纹的格子。
(2)屋檐。
(3)楼船。

櫺字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　櫺； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页562第17
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】郞丁切【正韻】離呈切，?音靈。【說文】楯閒子也。【徐曰】卽令人闌楯下爲橫櫺也。【何晏·景福殿賦】櫺檻邳張。【曹植·贈徐幹詩】流飆激櫺軒。　又屋梠也。【博雅】檐櫺，梠也。【孫綽·天台山賦】彤雲斐亹以翼櫺。亦作欞。一作㯪。

櫺字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
櫺字的起名意思

暂无。

lattice
Basic explanation of words
lattice
líng
See "Lie".
lattice
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［líng］
["Guangyun" Lang Dingqie, Pingqing, come. ]
Also known as "Lie 1".
(1) A lattice carved with patterns on windows or railings.
(2) The eaves.
(3) The ship on the floor.
lattice
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　棂; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 562 17
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Yin Dingqie [Zheng Yun] Li Chengqie, sound spirit. [Said the text] Xianzi also. [Xu Yue] 卽 makes people dazzle, and the next is horizontal. [He Yan·Jingfu Palace Fu] The threshold of Pi Zhang. 【Cao Zhi·Gift Xu Qian Poetry】Liu Soaring Exciting Xuan Xuan.　It's also a house. 【Liberal Arts】Eaves fringe, 梠 also. 【Sun Chuo·Tiantai Mountain Fu】Tongyun Feiyi is winged. Also used as a lattice. One for 㯪.
